name: preconception
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an idea or opinion formed before enough information is available to form it correctly: Try to go into the meeting without too many preconceptions about what the other group wants.

an idea or opinion formed before enough information is available to form it correctly: Many people still have preconceptions about how Native Americans live.
